xdsl_missing-rio_label: Please enter the PAC code to port your number.
xdsl_missing-rio_label_tooltip: How do I get a PAC code (Porting Authorisation Code)? It is a very simple process. Call 3179 for free from your landline: {{num}} This line is open 24/7. The PAC is a unique identifier that is 12 digits long.
xdsl_missing-rio_init_error: Your case does not seem to be related to a PAC error, or you have not yet sent this information.
